props.name: preferredPosition
props.description: The preferred direction to open the popover

props.name: allowMultiple
props.description: Allows more than one option to be selected

props.name: willLoadMoreOptions
props.description: Whether or not more options are available to lazy load when the bottom of the listbox reached. Use the hasMoreResults boolean provided by the GraphQL API of the paginated data.

props.name: height
props.description: Height to set on the Popover Pane.

events.name: scrolled-to-bottom
events.description: Callback fired when the bottom of the lisbox is reached. Use to lazy load when listbox option data is paginated.

events.name: close
events.description: Callback fired when the popover closes

slots.name: default
slots.description: The content to display inside the popover

slots.name: activator
slots.description: The text field component to activate the Popover
